anchoring.content:
You are a cognitive scientist, to answer the following question:
who is the actor that plays ducky on ncis
I will provide you with several retrieved passages:
Passages:
['BULLET::::- On "NCIS" season 12 episode 3 (October 7th 2014), Ducky (played by David McCallum) mentioned he used to play this game with his best friend Angus as a child.\n', 'BULLET::::- Ducky Mallard, medical examiner in the TV series "NCIS", played by David McCallum\n', 'Since 2003 McCallum has starred in the CBS television series "NCIS" as Dr. Donald "Ducky" Mallard, the team\'s chief medical examiner and one of the show\'s most popular characters. In Season 2 Episode 13 "The Meat Puzzle", NCIS Special Agent Caitlin Todd (Sasha Alexander) asks Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs (Mark Harmon), "What did Ducky look like when he was younger?" and Gibbs replies, "Illya Kuryakin".\n', 'Since September 2003, McCallum has been playing Dr. Donald "Ducky" Mallard in the highly successful American TV series "NCIS". In the Season 2 episode "The Meat Puzzle", around 20:50 into the episode, when Special Agent Kate Todd asks Special Agent Jethro Gibbs "What did Ducky look like when he was younger?," Gibbs responds "Illya Kuryakin". In that same episode, a photo of a much younger Ducky is actually a promotional photo from McCallum\'s "Man from U.N.C.L.E." days. In an episode during the 12th season of NCIS Dr. Mallard revisits his younger life in England. While looking at a photo of his younger self he states, "I miss those turtle-necks." an apparent reference to the wardrobe of Kuryakin.\n', "BULLET::::- Tress MacNeille as Daisy Duck, Chip 'n' Dale\n", 'BULLET::::- Judith Barsi as Ducky\n', 'Beginning in 2003, McCallum starred in the CBS television series "NCIS" as Dr. Donald "Ducky" Mallard, M.D., a medical examiner. During the episode "The Meat Puzzle" (season\xa02, episode\xa013), as an inside joke, NCIS agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs (Mark Harmon) is asked, "What did Ducky look like when he was younger?" Gibbs responds, "Illya Kuryakin". The photo supposedly of a younger Ducky is actually a promotional photo from McCallum\'s "Man from U.N.C.L.E." days.\n', 'Ducky is a medical examiner assigned to NCIS Headquarters. He is a crossover character from "NCIS".\n', 'BULLET::::- Donald "Ducky" Mallard, character in the TV show "NCIS"\n', 'BULLET::::- Tress MacNeille as Daisy Duck and Chip\n']

question_info.question: who is the actor that plays ducky on ncis
passages:
BULLET::::- On "NCIS" season 12 episode 3 (October 7th 2014), Ducky (played by David McCallum) mentioned he used to play this game with his best friend Angus as a child.
BULLET::::- Ducky Mallard, medical examiner in the TV series "NCIS", played by David McCallum
Since 2003 McCallum has starred in the CBS television series "NCIS" as Dr. Donald "Ducky" Mallard, the team's chief medical examiner and one of the show's most popular characters. In Season 2 Episode 13 "The Meat Puzzle", NCIS Special Agent Caitlin Todd (Sasha Alexander) asks Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs (Mark Harmon), "What did Ducky look like when he was younger?" and Gibbs replies, "Illya Kuryakin".
Since September 2003, McCallum has been playing Dr. Donald "Ducky" Mallard in the highly successful American TV series "NCIS". In the Season 2 episode "The Meat Puzzle", around 20:50 into the episode, when Special Agent Kate Todd asks Special Agent Jethro Gibbs "What did Ducky look like when he was younger?," Gibbs responds "Illya Kuryakin". In that same episode, a photo of a much younger Ducky is actually a promotional photo from McCallum's "Man from U.N.C.L.E." days. In an episode during the 12th season of NCIS Dr. Mallard revisits his younger life in England. While looking at a photo of his younger self he states, "I miss those turtle-necks." an apparent reference to the wardrobe of Kuryakin.
BULLET::::- Tress MacNeille as Daisy Duck, Chip 'n' Dale
BULLET::::- Judith Barsi as Ducky
Beginning in 2003, McCallum starred in the CBS television series "NCIS" as Dr. Donald "Ducky" Mallard, M.D., a medical examiner. During the episode "The Meat Puzzle" (season 2, episode 13), as an inside joke, NCIS agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs (Mark Harmon) is asked, "What did Ducky look like when he was younger?" Gibbs responds, "Illya Kuryakin". The photo supposedly of a younger Ducky is actually a promotional photo from McCallum's "Man from U.N.C.L.E." days.
Ducky is a medical examiner assigned to NCIS Headquarters. He is a crossover character from "NCIS".
BULLET::::- Donald "Ducky" Mallard, character in the TV show "NCIS"
BULLET::::- Tress MacNeille as Daisy Duck and Chip
